alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 8:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN GARDEN AND SOUTHEASTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 731 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antioch, or 19 miles east of Alliance, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Snow Lake, Diamond Lake, Patterson Lake, Lakeside, Argo Hill, and Herman Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 25. Highway 2 between mile markers 103 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
